Class AccountManagementPage

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.InfrastructureForPages.BasePage
com.Software.FitnessSystem.ClientPageNavigation.AccountManagementPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.Software.FitnessSystem.InfrastructureForPages.Page
public class AccountManagementPage extends com.Software.FitnessSystem.InfrastructureForPages.BasePage
The AccountManagementPage class represents a user interface for managing client accounts including creating profiles and updating details and setting the dietary preferences This class also extend BasePage
Author:
Alaa Alawneh
